Articles.Content: Hi! From a day to another scrolling is not working anymore. I knew this was an old solved problem, so anyone is having the same issue in 1.0.2 or knows a way to solve it? Thanks!
My 1.0.2 has not affected my mouse at all. Maybe your mouse is failing?
The mouse is not the problem, tried several ones and all are failing. And if I minimize the game the mouse wheel works fine everywhere else.

Once u minimize the game and go back does the scroll work normally?

THats what happens to my right mouse click
Sometimes, KSP just doesn't like mice. Mine is battery powered; removing and reinserting the battery always works for me.
